commit message: Simplify signed in check for activity
Correctly use auth token instead of password to create the HTTP client.
Change isSignedIn to mean an account exists (since signing out removes the account); let clearPassword first attempt to invalidate the auth token.
Update version number and release notes for 4.4.1
Conditionally update the game record when syncing the collection; fix syncing play count
Enable sorting collection by play count and my rating
Add a null check when saving state in CollectionActivity
Don't use auth in UpdateService - it's not necessary and was not safe to call on the main thread
Remove the line spacing <1; it cuts off some g's and j's
Change the date display in plays to support localization better
